newsitem.title: USA: New York Times says its ad volume drops.
newsitem.headline: New York Times says its ad volume drops.

text.p: New York Times Co said Monday advertising volume at the New York Times newspaper dropped 0.5 percent in August, while volume at its Boston Globe was down 1.1 percent in the same month.
For the year so far, ad volume was down 2.1 percent at the Times and down 0.6 percent at the Globe, it said.
The company's Regional Newspaper Group, comprised of 21 newspapers, posted an increase in ad volume for August of 1.3 percent, while volume declined 0.3 percent for the year to date, it said.
